text: Paul Edward Goldschmidt (born September 10, 1987 in Wilmington, Delaware) is an American baseball player. He currently plays as a first baseman for the St. Louis Cardinals of Major League Baseball (MLB). He debuted for the Diamondbacks on August 1, 2011 in a game against the San Francisco Giants.http://mlb.mlb.com/news/article.jsp?ymd=20110801&content;_id=22615158&vkey;=affililiate&c;_id=ari ==References== ==Other websites== *Paul Goldschmidt at mlb.com Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:American baseball players Category:Arizona Diamondbacks players Category:Sportspeople from Wilmington, Delaware
title: Paul Goldschmidt
